mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD( BNO ,BTYPE ,BTITLE ,BCONTENT ,BNICK ,BFILE ,BINSERTDATE ,BUPDATEDATE ,BVIEW ,BDELETEYN ,BHITS ) VALUES ( #{bno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,'C' ,#{btitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{bcontent, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{bnick, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{bfile, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,SYSDATE ,SYSDATE ,0 ,'Y' ,0 )
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM BOARD A WHERE A.BDELETEYN = 'Y'
AND TO_CHAR(A.BINSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{startdate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(A.BINSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{enddate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND A.BTITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND A.BCONTENT LIKE '%' || #{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND A.BTITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' AND A.BCONTENT LIKE '%' || #{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND A.BNICK LIKE '%' || #{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND A.BNO LIKE '%' || #{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
ORDER BY 1

/* Board - boardDetail */ SELECT A.BNO ,A.BTYPE ,A.BTITLE ,A.BCONTENT ,A.BNICK ,A.BFILE ,TO_CHAR(A.BINSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BINSERTDATE ,TO_CHAR(A.BUPDATEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BUPDATEDATE ,A.BVIEW ,A.BDELETEYN ,A.BHITS FROM BOARD A WHERE A.BNO = #{bno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.BDELETEYN = 'Y'
